::DarkMouse::

She turned and ran over to Black Aracnia. "NOW LOOK!" her energon 
boiling,"I don't like this.  I have said it before and I will say it 
again.  Something is majorly wrong.  Megatron is one not to be 
trusted.  With Anything. And I don't care if he hears me. Further 
more, this ...thing.. is just allowed to walk in and do waht it 
wants, when it wants it and no one will stop it from doing 
anything.   Megarton is the only one who knows anything and yet he is 
not telling you anything about what is going on.  If you want to 
survive, we had better do something.  I have served and died for you 
and Megatron in the past.   I died for Magatron.  I died for you.  
Now I'll die for  no one.  Save one.  And he isn't going to ask.  So 
what do I care.  Either we do something and gain some sort of 
advantage, or we get killed for nothing.  Not even trying to save 
ourselves.  So let me know what you want and I'll help, but decide 
fast OK?!"


She stood there fuming.  She was madd and getting madder.  She was 
going to die.  That much she knew.  But she wanted to die in battle 
and not just standing around.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia watches Darkmouse walk off. She saved her life, and 
this was her 
> payback? "Leave. Go. Abandon us in our time of need. And once your 
out, dont 
> bother coming back, or I'll sic Tarantulas on you."
>     Hell Beast now was looking into the opening, his scanners 
picked up  the 
> oxygen catastrophy. But these bots bots were still here...and a 
threat to any 
> possible colonization efforts.
>     "Your cleared from all charges. But, your presence here has 
become 
> undesireable. You have 5 days to get every transformer off the 
planet or you 
> all will be destroyed." Hell Beast said with arrogance.
>     "Ah, I thought this would happen. I dont suppose killing you 
would stop 
> you then?" Aracnia said as she raised her bowcaster.
>     "No, in fact it would only make things much wor-" He stopped as 
Aracnia 
> blew off his head. His body sank to the ground like a dead weight.
>     "get rid of it. Tarantulas, we had better think of something. 
These 
> aliens are pissed."
> 
>     Megatron returns to the Cave and see's its a mess, and battle 
is brewing. 
> "KITKAT! REPORT HERE AT ONCE! Waspinator, bring up communications, 
Im going 
> to get back into that ship!"
